attributes.action: Increase top rate of income tax for earnings over 250k pa
attributes.additional_details: Introduced in 1907, and abolished in 1973, the top rate of income tax was called Supertax, and  in 1973, this tax was 19 shillings and 6 pence in the pound (97.5 %) over a certain wage. Today, the government worry about imposing a 50% income tax. Let the government raise income tax for all who earn over 250K pa to 75% on all income over this amount, and ensure that both individuals, and firms, pay British tax on all earnings in the UK!
